title: For partners
tab_1_text: The Uralsnabresurs company has the opportunity to provide free samples of clamps for scaffolding for review and testing. We are ready to provide you with product samples so that you can verify the quality and suitability of our clamps to your needs. To receive samples, please fill in the required fields
tab_1_sub: *this offer is valid for companies that have not previously collaborated with us and is for advertising and informational purposes only
tab_2_text: Regarding the supply of your products or services, please write to usr3@mail.ru, if your offer seems interesting and in demand for our needs, then you will be contacted .
